skos:Concept.rdfs:label: Book
skos:Concept.rdfs:comment: A written or printed work of fiction or nonfiction, usually on sheets of paper fastened or bound together within covers.

skos:Concept.rdfs:label: Issue
skos:Concept.rdfs:comment: something that is printed or published and distributed, esp. a given number of a periodical

skos:Concept.rdfs:label: Journal
skos:Concept.rdfs:comment: A periodical of scholarly journal Articles.

skos:Concept.rdfs:label: Letter
skos:Concept.rdfs:comment: A written or printed communication addressed to a person or organization and usually transmitted by mail.

skos:Concept.rdfs:label: Series
skos:Concept.rdfs:comment: A loose, thematic, collection of Documents, often Books.

skos:Concept.rdfs:label: Document
skos:Concept.rdfs:comment: ProvidedCHO of type document. Unlike foaf:Document, dm2e:Document refers to a physical document.

skos:Concept.rdfs:label: Manuscript
skos:Concept.rdfs:comment: ProvidedCHO of type manuscript, e.g. Wittgensteins brown book. Not equivalent to bibo:Manuscript. Not equivalent to bibo:Manuscript.

skos:Concept.rdfs:label: Page
skos:Concept.rdfs:comment: A sheet of paper. Can be part of another CHO, e.g. dm2e:Manuscript.

skos:Concept.rdfs:label: Paragraph
skos:Concept.rdfs:comment: ProvidedCHO of type paragraph. Can be part of another (textual) CHO, e.g. dm2e:Manuscript.

skos:Concept.rdfs:label: Work
skos:Concept.rdfs:comment: A non-physical piece of work of an agent, e.g. the theoretical concept of a manuscript.

skos:Concept.rdfs:label: article
skos:Concept.rdfs:comment: The realization of a piece of writing on a particular topic, usually published within a periodical publication (e.g. journal, magazine and newspaper).

skos:Concept.rdfs:label: chapter
skos:Concept.rdfs:comment: A defined document section, forming part of or intended for inclusion within a larger document, usually with its own title or chapter number. Different chapters within a document such as a book or a report may each be independently authored, or may all be authored by a single individual or group of authors.

skos:Concept.rdfs:label: cover
skos:Concept.rdfs:comment: A protective covering used to bind together the pages of a document or the first, informative, page of a digital document.
